title: Waste Collection Schedule Update
author: BIN-I Team
description: The waste collection schedule for Cavite City has been updated. Please check the new schedule to ensure timely waste disposal.
content: {"time":1725028690447,"blocks":[{"id":"1","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The waste collection schedule has been revised to improve efficiency."}},{"id":"2","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Check the updated schedule on our website."}},{"id":"3","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"For any questions, contact our support team."}}],"version":"2.30.5"}

title: Community Cleanup Event
